ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: Start_Date__c - TODAY() < 14 && Start_Date__c - TODAY() >=0 && text(Reservation_Status__c ) ='Cancel' && ( NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'Administrator')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot cancel the reservation. Please contact training administrator at training.solutions2@honeywell.com or (602)365-2833.
